backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting 7 implemented features including hero section, product sections, reviews, newsletter, and footer with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, contexts, and utilities for the e-commerce application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors, borders, and component styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with 8 routes and wrapping the application with AuthProvider and CartProvider contexts.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item component displaying product image, details, quantity controls with plus/minus buttons, and remove functionality.
Customer reviews section displaying 3 hardcoded 5-star reviews with author names and comments in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: Featured products section showing the first 4 products from constants in a responsive grid with heading and description.
frontend/src/components/FiltersSidebar.t: Collapsible filters sidebar with category checkboxes, price range slider, and rating filters, supporting both desktop and mobile sheet layouts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with multi-column navigation links (Products, Company, Support, Legal), social media icons, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with animated text content, CTA buttons (Shop Now, Learn More), and a large product image with fade-in animations on mount.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile navigation links, user account icon, shopping cart with item count badge, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterSignup: Newsletter subscription section with email input form and success message that auto-clears after 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/OrderHistory.tsx: Displays mock order history with order details, status badges (processing/shipped/delivered), item thumbnails, and total prices.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Simple product card component with image, name, and price that navigates to product detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailsTa: Tabbed interface for product details showing description, specifications table, and mock customer reviews with ratings.
frontend/src/components/ProductGallery.t: Product image gallery with large main image and thumbnail grid for selecting different product views.
Enhanced product card with hover effects, wishlist heart button, add-to-cart button, and navigation to product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductInfoPanel: Displays product details with interactive controls for size, color, and quantity selection, plus 'Add to Cart' and 'Buy Now' buttons that navigate to the cart page.
Renders two featured products in alternating left-right layout with scroll-triggered fade-in animations using the useScrollAnimation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEdit.tsx: Provides a form for editing user profile information (name, email, phone) and displays a placeholder section for managing saved addresses.
frontend/src/components/SortDropdown.tsx: A dropdown select component for sorting products by featured, price (low/high), or rating.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Displays three benefit cards (Fast Shipping, Premium Quality, 24/7 Support) with icons and descriptions in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/WishlistView.tsx: Shows a grid of wishlist products with remove buttons and 'Add to Cart' functionality for each item.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication context with mock login/register/logout functions and persists user data to localStorage.
frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx: Manages shopping cart state with add, remove, update, and clear operations, persisting cart items to localStorage and calculating totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication integration with AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element becomes visible in the viewport for triggering scroll animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (colors, radius) and utility classes for touch targets and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountDashboard.tsx: User account dashboard with tabbed navigation for profile, orders, wishlist, and settings, plus logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items, order summary with shipping costs, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form page with shipping address input, payment method selection, and order summary display.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page composing hero section, featured products, benefits, showcase, reviews, and newsletter signup components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with email/password form, remember me checkbox, and link to registration page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page with image gallery, product info panel, size/color/quantity selection, and sticky mobile add-to-cart bar.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListingPage.ts: Product listing page with filterable sidebar (category, price, rating) and sortable product grid display.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: User registration page component with form fields for name, email, password, and password confirmation, using AuthContext for registration and navigation to account page on success.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: TypeScript type definitions for core data models including Product, CartItem, User, Address, Order, and Review interfaces used throughout the application.
frontend/src/utils/constants.ts: Constants file defining product catalog data (5 premium tech products with details), category list, and shipping cost configuration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions for colors using OKLCH color space, typography, spacing, shadows, border radius, and animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an Apple-inspired minimal e-commerce site with architectural notes, feature list, image requirements, and design principles emphasizing clean aesthetics and responsive layouts.
